comments:
I try to debug this code fragment below:

<?php

$x = 4;

class One {
	function execute() {
		echo "Execute One";
	}
}

class Two {
	function execute() {
		echo "Execute Two";
	}
}

class Factory {
	function call($object) {
		return new $object;
	}
}

$factory = new Factory(); // Add breakpoint here
$factory->call('Two')->execute();
?>

After pressing F11 one time and F5 three times, an exception has been thrown and stored in log file:
